name: ProductCatalogRel
comment: Maintains the relationship between different types of product catalog items.
vf short description: Maintains the relationship between different types of product catalog items.

fields.name: ProductCatalogRelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ProductCatalogRelKey
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies the relationship between different product catalog items at a specific time. Generated Key based on Product Catalog Rel Id and Child Product Catalog Type Key

fields.name: ParentProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChildProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the effective date of the relationship between product catalog items. //For Product offering --> Product offering RelationshipIf Rel Record is new insert then set to Current Date//For Product Offering -> Product SpecificationProductOffering.ValidFor.StartDateTime//For Product Specification -> Product Specification RelationshipProductSpecification.ValidFor.StartDateTime Or Product SpecificationRelationship.ValidFor.StartDateTime// Customized per implementation

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the end date of the relationship between product catalog items. //For Product offering --> Product offering RelationshipIf ProductOfferingRelationship.expiredForSale becomes True then set to SysDate.//For Product Offering -> Product Specification RelationshipProductOffering.ValidFor.EndDateTime//For Product Specification -> Product Specification RelationshipProductSpecification.ValidFor.EndDateTime else if Product SpecificationRelationship.ValidFor.EndDateTimeElse If ProductSpecification.expiredForSale become True then set to SysDate// Customized per implementation

fields.name: CurrentFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether this product catalog relationship is currently active.Values are:- 1 - The relationship is currently active.- 0 - The relationship is currently not active. //For Product offering --> Product offeringIf ProductOfferingRelationship.expiredForSales = True Then 0 Else 1//For Product Specification --> Product SpecificationIf ProductSpecification.expiredForSales = True Then 0 Else 1//For Product Offering --> Product SpecificationIf ProductOffering.expiredForSales = True Then 0 Else 1

fields.name: ParentProductCatalogId
fields.comment: Identifies the parent product catalog item within the source system. //For Product offering --> Product offering//From ProductOfferingRelationship section sourceProductOffering.id//For Product Specification --> Product Specification//From ProductSpecification section ProductSpecification.Id//For Product Offering --> Product Specification//From ProductOffering section ProductOffering.id

fields.name: ChildProductCatalogId
fields.comment: Identifies the child product catalog item within the source system. //For Product offering --> Product offering//From ProductOfferingRelationship section targetProductOffering.id Where ProductOfferingRelationship.targetProductOffering.Id is not null//For Product Specification --> Product Specification//From ProductSpecification section productSpecificationRelationship.id  where productSpecificationRelationship.id is not null//For Product Offering --> Product Specification//From ProductOffering section ProductSpecification.id

fields.name: RootProductCatalogId
fields.comment: Indicates the root product catalog Id from the source.

fields.name: RootProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductCatalogRelId
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies the relationship between different product catalog items at a specific time. //For Product offering --> Product offering//From ProductOfferingRelationship section sourceProductOffering.id + targetProductOffering.id Where ProductOfferingRelationship.targetProductOffering.Id is not blank//For Product Specification --> Product Specification//From ProductSpecification section Product Specification.Id + productSpecificationRelationship.id //For Product Offering --> Product Specification//From ProductOffering section Product Offering.id + ProductSpecification.id

fields.name: ProductCatalogRelVersionId
fields.comment: Indicates the version of the product catalog relationship. //Not Relevant

fields.name: ChildProductCatalogTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ParentProductCatalogTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductCatalogRelTypeInd
fields.comment: Business Relationship type (valid constant value is: commercialRelation) //For Product offering --> Product offering RelationshipProductOfferingRelationship.relationType//For Product Offering -> Product Specification RelationshipNot applicable//For Product Specification -> Product Specification RelationshipNot applicable

fields.name: ProductCatalogRelRoleInd
fields.comment: Business Relationship role //For Product offering --> Product offering RelationshipProductOfferingRelationship.relationRole//For Product Offering -> Product Specification RelationshipNot applicable//For Product Specification --> ProductSpecification RelationshipsProductSpecificationRelationship.role

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
